title: James Acaster - Judgement Day • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #200
itunes:title: James Acaster - Judgement Day • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #200
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the first guest to ever appear on the podcast - it's JAMES ACASTER!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the first guest to ever appear on the podcast - it's JAMES ACASTER!


Episode 200, folks. A big one. We made it. And what better way to celebrate than by getting the first ever guest and show favourite Jamesback on board to talk all things life and film... James is awesome and you know it's a winner with him and Brett - there is clear evidence of this in the show archives if needed - so please enjoy this big numbered episode as Brett takes a breather (after one more forthcoming ep, that is), and let's celebrate what we've all done here. Smell the flowers. Inhale for like 4 seconds and exhale for, I dunno, 5. Have a nap. Take a rest. Read a book. But know that Films To Be Buried With continues in our minds, souls and ears forever. And maybe in a real, tangible sense. We shall see. We all love you very much, and while we'll be back next week for one more goody, let's take this chance to celebrate - bests to you all, and huge love. Be excellent to each other.
